name: Unordinary Outcast
description:
After winning the Tournament, Scott's problem seems to be all solved. Until an uprising Celebrity who reign in terror onto his new home. Would he solved this Crisis by himself again, or getting some New Friends to solve this out together

Controls for Keyboard / Mouse / PlayStation or Xbox Controller

Movement: Arrow Keys Left Click Directional Buttons or Left Analogue Stick Interact: Z Button Left Click X / A Fast Forward: F Button  Menu/Cancel: X Button Right Click Menu: Triangle / Y - Cancel: Circle / B

Patch Notes:

  • Update #1: Game Released
  • Update #2: Bug & Fixes
